result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott Hamilton Davis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).
  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Release date will be September 4, 2016 at 7:00 am. This is with good time factored in.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Scott Hamilton Davis
Current: 312 East Elm St, C/O Kristen Nelson, River Falls, WI 54022 United States  (Effective: 07-27-2016)
Prior: 123 1/2 South Main Street, River Falls, WI 54022

9:55  Defendant Scott Hamilton Davis in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. OSullivan - Amended information will be filed by the DA Office for 2 Cts of Poss of Controlled Substance  - Misdemeanor 964341(3)(G)(b)    Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def   Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights  10:01  Recess  10:02 Court resumes    DEF PLEADS no contest  to Ct 1 of the amended information    DEF PLEADS no contest to Ct 2 of the amended information.   Facts are correct  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guiltyof Ct 1 & Ct 2 of the amended information  Court orders 25 days jail on each count consecutive to each other.  Jail sentence is stayed until July 29, 2016 at 7:00 pm  release date with good time is Sept 4, 2016 7:00 AM  This is with good time factored in.  Huber is allowed. Appeal rights are given to him.
Plea hearing on June 20, 2016 at 09:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 12, 2016 at 04:15 pm.

Defendant Scott Hamilton Davis in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information Filed with the Court and a copy is given to the defendant.    Defendant has a copy of the information  and waives reading of the information.  Defendant enters not guilty plea to Count 1, Count 2 and Count 3 at preliminary hearing.  Not guilty plea received by the court  Pretrial Conference to be set.  The bond will continue as ordered.  Court reviews bond conditions with defendant.

9:53 a.m.  Defendant Scott Hamilton Davis in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Written waiver of preliminary hearing is filed and the court reviews with the defendant.    Judge exams the defendant re the waiver of preliminary hearing.  Court finds defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to a preliminary hearing.  Court Finds probable cause and binds defendant over .
Defendant knowingly and willingly waives his right to have his preliminary hearing with in 20 days.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 3:55 Defendant Scott Hamilton Davis in court, in custody.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin via phone. Atty Lars Loberg appears in court for the Public Defender's Office.   Defendant has copy of complaint.  Court reads charges and possible penalties.  Defendant waives reading of the complaint.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant.  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. OSullivan: $3000 signature bond. Loberg has no objection.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 25, 2016 at 09:45 am.
